attributes.action: create a sovereign wealth fund to develop a national network of economic activities to expand and support the British Tax payer, boosting our national income and preparing this country for the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK has declining production, financial services that have been the backbone of growth are mobile in the current age.  This is a risk.  A sovereign wealth fund could amass resourses to invest overseas and develop an economic network where our economy is supported by the activities of others.  This will prepare this nation for the future.
